steps.note: No blockers or unresolved targets; proceed with graph analysis.

steps.intention: Analyze the graph to determine function symmetry
steps.note: Check if the function is symmetric about the y-axis (even) or origin (odd).

steps.intention: Determine the function type based on symmetry
steps.note: If f(x) = f(-x), the function is even. If f(-x) = -f(x), the function is odd.

steps.intention: Select the correct option based on function type
